Han Kim

Full-Stack Web Developer & Entrepreneur

Han is an entrepreneur at heart who recently embarked on a journey to become a full-stack web developer. Shortly after earning a degree in business administration at Babson College, he also graduated from a rigorous 19-week coding program where he learned how to quickly fathom complexities.

The combination of his preexisting business acumen from his past startups and the newly earned knowledge in programming languages such as Ruby and JS makes him a force to be reckoned with amongst the tech startup community.

Born: August 13, 1991

Origin: Rhode Islander, via South Korea

Education: Babson College (2014) 3.56 GPA

Education: Dev Bootcamp (2015) +1,000 HRS of Coding

Languages: Javascript & Ruby

Technologies: AngularJS, Rails, Sinatra, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, Postgresql, Ionic

Interests: Celtics, Patriots, League of Legends

Blog: hellohankim.com
